validation.command: rch exec -- env CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target/rch_bd17z7_3_fix_check cargo check -p frankenengine-node --all-targets
rch exec -- env CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target/rch_bd17z7_3_fix_clippy cargo clippy -p frankenengine-node --all-targets -- -D warnings
rch exec -- env CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target/rch_bd17z7_3_fix_tests cargo test -p frankenengine-node --bin frankenengine-node runtime::lane_router::tests -- --nocapture

notes: Lane-router now rejects duplicate operation IDs even when the first instance is still queued.
Explicit lane hints now require matching capability scope to prevent priority-lane escalation by hint spoofing.
Saturation telemetry is now emitted consistently for non-background ShedOldest rejection paths.
